CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Kenon Holdings Ltd is a holding company that operates dynamic, primarily growth-oriented, businesses. The company's operating segments include OPC; CPV Group; Quantum and ZIM. It generates maximum revenue from the OPC segment. OPC operates in the Israeli electricity generation sector, including the initiation, development, construction, and operation of power plants and the sale and supply of electricity. Geographically, it derives a majority of revenue from Israel.
